text: WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump has weighed in on the Emmys, which were heavy on humor and swipes at his expense. “ I was saddened to see how bad the ratings were on the Emmys last night – the worst ever. Smartest people of them all are the ‘ DEPLORABLES,'” he wrote on on Tuesday night, two days after Sunday ’ s Primetime Emmy Awards telecast. The President is in New York, staying at Trump Tower, during the United Nations General Assembly. I was saddened to see how bad the ratings were on the Emmys last night – the worst ever. Smartest people of them all are the ` ` DEPLORABLES.'' — Donald J. Trump ( @ realDonaldTrump ) September
